```{r}
library(Matrix)
A=sparseMatrix(seq(1,length(teams$Team)),seq(1,length(teams$Team)),x=0)
b=rep(1,length(teams$Team))

for(i in 1:length(scores$Team1)){
  if(abs(scores[i,]$Score1-scores[i,]$Score2)>=6){
    if(scores[i,]$Score1>scores[i,]$Score2){
      Share1<-1
      Share2<-0
    } else{
      Share2<-1
      Share1<-0
    }
  } else{
    Share1<-shares[scores[i,]$Score1-scores[i,]$Score2+6]
    Share2<-1-Share1
  }
  team1=match(scores[i,]$Team1,teams$Team)
  team2=match(scores[i,]$Team2,teams$Team)
  if( is.na(team1) | is.na(team2)){ next }
  A[team1,team2]=
    A[team1,team2]+Share2
  A[team2,team1]=
    A[team2,team1]+Share1
  A[team1,team1]=
    A[team1,team1]+Share1
  A[team2,team2]=
    A[team2,team2]+Share2
}
image(A)


A_unnormed <- A
for(i in 1:length(teams$Team)){
  if(sum(A[i,])!=0){ 
    A[i,]=A[i,]/sum(A[i,])
  }
}

library(expm)
```

```{r}
region = "New England"
division = "Division III"
bids <- 3
rankedteams %>% filter(`College Region` == region & `Competition Division` == division) %>% select(-`Competition Level`,-`Gender Division`,-Links) %>% View
indices <- rankedteams %>% filter(`College Region` == region & `Competition Division` == division) %>% select(-`Competition Level`,-`Gender Division`,-Links) %>% .$Index

possibleTeams <-indices[1:bids]
cat(possibleTeams, " ")
team <-bids+1
possible =TRUE
while(possible){
  if(Predict_Margin(A_unnormed, shares, indices[team],possibleTeams[bids])>-3 ){
    possibleTeams <- indices[1:team]
    cat(possibleTeams[team], " ")
    team=team+1
    if(team > length(indices)){
      possible = FALSE
    }
  } else{
    possible = FALSE
  }
}
```

```{r}
MOV=diag(rep(0,length(possibleTeams)))
for( i in 1:(length(possibleTeams)-1)){
  for(j in (i+1):length(possibleTeams)){
    MOV[i,j]= Predict_Margin(A_unnormed , shares, possibleTeams[j], possibleTeams[i])
    cat(teams$Team[possibleTeams[i]]," ", teams$Team[possibleTeams[j]], ":", MOV[i,j], "\n")
    MOV[j,i]=-MOV[i,j]
  }
}
```
